item.title: Janine add a quote by Elizabeth Wurtzel
item.description: "Doing nothing is opting for the sweetness of stillness...Instead of fighting with that which you cannot control, you might as well just see it through..." -- Elizabeth Wurtzel

item.title: Janine add a quote by Sloane Crosley
item.description: "Life starts out with everyone clapping when you take a poo and goes downhill from there. " -- Sloane Crosley

item.title: Janine add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Janine add a quote by Martin Amis
item.description: "You know how it is when two souls meet in a burst of ecstatic volubility, with hearts tickling to hear and to tell, to know everything, to reveal everything, the shared reverence for the other's otherness, a feeling of solitude radiantly snapped by full *contact* - all that?" -- Martin Amis
